advancements.goety_revelation.summon_apo: And in those days shall men seek death, and shall not find it; and shall desire to die, and death shall flee from them.(9:6)
advancements.goety_revelation.defeat_apo: Defeated The Avatar of Apollyon,the god of the wrecked nether.

tooltip.goety_revelation.tip1: §6§oThe sacred halo§r§5§o symbolizing the elevation of life
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip2: §5§oIn selection, no scale of high or low, no scale of base or grand,Blessed by His grace, one can bear the §c§oapostolic§r§5§o brand.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip3: §0§kNow I claim your place, your talents to pursue&r
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip4: §4§L§oHe§r§5§o speaks §4'I am the one who leads, for you I'll clear the hill.'
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip5: In §4§L§oHis§r§5§o palm, I saw the vista, the future's tale unfolds,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip6: §5§oTwelve §c§oapostles§r§5§o, under millennia's trials, their stories told.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip7: §5§oNow, they gain a new companion, Awaiting §4§L§oHis§r§5§o remains, their steadfastness unbarre.,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip8: §5§oUntil the fire of §6§ojudgment§r§5§o once more its radiance spreads,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip9: §0§kUntil the end of days, when all is said and done
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip10: §4§l§oYou§r§7§o, for the §r§b§osouls§r§7§o of all, strive and care,
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip11: §7§oWe, in the eternal night, sing §4§l§oYour§r§7§o name, so that it may still be heard and rare.
tooltip.goety_revelation.tip13: Even if it's broken and tarnished, it can still protect you from some damage.
